name: New Year's Morning
description:
We on our back staring at the stars above
Talking bout what we gonna be when we grow up
I said, "What you wanna be?" She said, "Alive"
Outkast, Da Art Of Storytellin' Pt.1

A simple conversation between two lovers on the New Year's first morning.

This is just a little game to celebrate the new year and to introduce our future project.
We hope you'll enjoy it!

Art, Story and Programming:
Rinkaku

Sounds:
Freesound and
freetousesounds' collection 'Powerful Indian Ocean Sounds La Réunion Island'

Story loosely inspired by
Hong Sang-soo's 'The Woman Who Ran'
Outkast's 'Da Art of Storytellin' Pt.1'

If you enjoyed the game leave a comment or a rating!
